description: Security pack: detect hardcoded password in config

files.content:
[database]
host = db.internal
port = 5432
password = 'SuperSecretP@ssw0rd!'
user = admin

explanation_trace.why_triggered: Content matches the hardcoded password regex: password followed by = and a quoted string of 8+ chars
explanation_trace.edge_case_notes: The regex requires at least 8 characters in the password value to reduce false positives
